channel.title: Checking help!

item.title: Checking help!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Openup NPCHandler.java and look for

if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected) {

Below it, you can add what needs to be done when a player has killed a specific. Use it like this:

if ((npcs[i].npcType == npcID Here){
								// Do stuff here
								}

Read full topic

item.title: Checking help!
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

anyone have a clue how to check if an NPC died?

not every NPC that you kill, but a specific NPC

I tried doing

if (npcid == 1) { if ((IsAttackingNPC == true) && (deathStage == 0)) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc] != null) { if ((server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsDead == false) && (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].MaxHP > 0)) { AttackNPC(); } else { ResetAttackNPC(); }

But it never workedâ€¦

so i need someone to tell me how to get the server to check if the player killed a specific NPC

Read full topic
